formatted_address: 10 Eunos 8, B1-137/138 Singapore Post Centre, Singapore 408600
name: Watsons Singapore - Singapore Post Centre (Click & Collect)

reviews.text:
I love to shop here. Helpful staff and good people. I read reviews here on how bad or rude they got treated but, i like to disagree because ive witnessed many times how other customers were so unreasonable and so annoyingly inconsiderate.

The staffs has great vibes and was told the name of the in charge person that I like to compliment - Subhi something.
Never open on time!! Isnt pharmacy supposed to espcly open on time in case of emergency otherwise why put up such schedule!!

Worst customer service of all times be it the temp or full-time staff!  Make no apologies for price tagging error.  One item, but item code written wrongly on so many pieces.  Not the customer's fault.  Not even a show of good faith.  Just void your purchase without even telling you and asked that you pay for the new item entry. Well done, Watsons!

Very rude malaysian female staff. Pulled down roller shutter before 10pm closing hours. Asked for help to find medicine and cashier said watson do not sell any of such stuff.

No help offer...better go to Guardian
Worse place and service. Staff don't want to work and when they charge wrong and ask for refund, no apology and alot of attitude
